title: TylerDurden09
author: TylerDurden09
content: I have theÂ  futurebit Apollo, I am looking to put it to better use given the mining is not profitable at all. I see umbrel and terminal web and these are full os that wont be possible with my unit. Any suggestions to put this unit to better use?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Since these units eat power of around 200w I don't think it would be worth mining solo but why not participate on the lightning network?I think you can earn some BTC by having a lightning network?Read more here Can you earn passive income running a Lightning node?

comments.author: TylerDurden09
comments.body: I have been seeing a lot about lightning node on youtube, They seem to need or are an OS in it's self, I guess I am looking for an app I can add to my device.
